data.actual_result: Discord continues to think it's scanning
data.short_description: Nearby scanning doesn't stop after denying permission
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Android Settings > Google > Nearby > Settings cog, and make sure Discord is off - Restart Discord - Go to Friends > Add Friends, and tap the "start nearby scanning" button - When the Nearby permission modal opens (it might take a while for it to open), tap "deny" - Observe that Discord thinks it's still scanning, even though it doesn't have the permission to do so
